page.title: 03Cattle Market Haverfordwest
page.content: The Mart ground in haverfordwest is in Perrots Road. It is open on Tuesdays for the sale of farmer's Stock. The sales are conducted by the owning auctioneers Basil Jones and Son. There are three main sale rings, one for beef stores another for dairy cows and the third and most used is for calves. Figures for sales are approximately: calves 20 to 25000 per year with a peak of 750 in one day usually in January, reflecting the calving patterns of the large local dairy farming community. Beef stores number 10 to 11000 and cows about 1750 per year. On the mart ground there are also many trade stands selling a variety of things of interest to farmers from machinery to clothing.
